column4: can someone tell me why when I start to type something in the Run Application (Alt + F2) the letters apear after 3seconds and my CPU usage is 100%

because some features of the run command havn't been implimented yet so you entries are processed remotely by a team of highly trained circus monkeys whose respone is processed by an extremly complex algorithm hence the high cpu usage and delay.
do you think that this is funny ?
no, and the poor creatures are overworked and underpaid, barely making enough money. but one day they'll buy their freedom
